src:
С компании сына Юрия Чайки в суде хотят взыскать 7 миллиардов рублей
02 Nov 2019, 08:47 by Информационная служба Накануне.RU
Компания ООО "Нетч Тула" подала иск к ООО "Хартия". Сумма искового заявления – 7,1 млрд руб. Об этом сообщается в карточке дела в картотеке арбитражного суда Москвы.



ООО "Хартия" – компания, в которой 60% принадлежат Игорю Чайке (сын генпрокурора России), мусорный оператор, работающий в нескольких регионах.
ООО "Нетч Тула" - дочерняя компания NETZSCH Feinmahltechnik Gmbh, производит различные виды измельчающего оборудования.
text:
Moscow City Hall machine crushed a man: details of a terrible accident
02 Nov 2019, 08:44 by Elena Semenova

The injured citizen is now in serious condition in the intensive care unit

Moscow, November 2. In the Russian capital in a parking lot near the city administration building, a car that belongs to the city hall crushed a man. Video from the scene of an accident appeared on the web. The published frames show that people are walking along the sidewalk, at that time one of the parked cars abruptly “leans” back and imprints a man on the wall.
- The Audi driver did not immediately respond to the accident. The victim about 15 seconds was pressed against the wall by transport. Only after that the motorist drove away, write the local media.
It is known that the victim was identified in the intensive care unit. Now doctors are doing everything to save a man’s life. The transport driver himself says that the car spontaneously drove back, and he did not have time to stop it.
Earlier, “Region Online” said that in Moscow a car of the local city hall crushed a man. The circumstances of the accident are established by the competent authorities.
Read us on News
